font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 宽敞舒适的 comfortably or conveniently spacious: roomy
【例】a commodious closet 宽敞的衣橱
【近】spacious, roomy
【反】constricted, cramped, snug, constringed 狭窄的

【记】 accommodate 供给,提供住宿
